name: anathema (itch) (P7153)
description:
A 12-level shoot-em-up where you have to sacrifice your movement controls to continue after dying. When you start losing control, pinball yourself off the sides of the screen to maneuver! Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Controls:

  • Z to select from menus
  • X or Esc to pause and unpause
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Mouse to aim, left mouse button to shoot
